body: Could've been alot better if the author had one of them sit on his face. What a waste

@hiimrickross look bro I got that but it's not my job to work around shitty tagging. My cock is in one hand and my phone in the other. I ain't got goddamned time to be typing shit in to work around this uploader's incompetence

@hiimrickross They make a valid point though, tags are one of the most basic and useful features of this site, and it would be almost completely useless if there were no tags or inconsistent tagging like this mess. Shitty tagging leads to stuff slipping through blacklists, artists getting their work split up, and making it harder to find stuff in general. The extra work should NOT fall on the user to manually search for shit constantly because of somebody fucking up the tags. TBH though I wouldn't be surprised if it's just a bot scraping these hentais and tags from a different site and uploading it without cleaning up/cross-referencing the info. A community tagging system of some sort would really help sort this mess out, but it took centuries for comments to return so...

@Asunon
Hey idiot, while the tag may be fucked up, the name is right there. Search "nodame" and you get everything else by him, including part one. OR maybe search the name? Think about it.

Whoever is uploading these and splitting the artist tags with a goddamned | needs to fucking realize that these don't get tagged properly and people can't fucking find the artist's other works. I clicked the artist name on this upload and it gives me nothing. Can't fucking find part 1, let alone the artist who fucking DREW IT. Like how Ratatatat74 has s ton of comics on here but NONE of them are tagged properly. Stupid dipshit motherfucker. I am TIRED of your incompetence. Pick one fucking tag and USE IT.
Totally forgot this was going to have a part 2
